name: Escape from New York
description: In a dystopian future where Manhattan has become a maximum-security prison, a convict is sent in to rescue the President of the United States.

name: Blade Runner
description: In a future where synthetic humans known as replicants are used for labor, a retired cop is tasked with hunting down rogue replicants.

name: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

name: District 9
description: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly finds a kindred spirit in a government worker who is exposed to their biotechnology.

name: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

name: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a drifter teams up with a rebellious woman to overthrow a tyrannical warlord and his army.

name: Inception
description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets from their subconscious is given the task of planting an idea in the mind of a CEO.

name: The Fifth Element
description: In the 23rd century, a cab driver becomes a key figure in the search for a mysterious woman who is the key to saving Earth from a cosmic evil.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: A cyborg is sent from the future to protect a young boy whose destiny is to lead the human resistance against the machines.

name: Star Trek
description: A young crew of the U.S.S. Enterprise must come together to prevent a Romulan from destroying the Federation.

name: Arrival
description: A linguist is recruited to help communicate with extraterrestrials who have landed on Earth and must decipher their language to prevent global war.
